content: this mosaic crochet square with glow-in-the-dark yarn makes the perfect halloween accent in daylight it features a smiling jack-o-lantern face but after dark it reveals a spooky surprise it makes a great introduction to mosaic crochet too **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this mosaic crochet pattern in the color changes made easy ebook with 30 crochet patterns 40 pixel graphs 58 videos and lots of bonus right here 3 *** ***you can also get this mosaic crochet pattern in an ebook with 60 crochet patterns right here 2 *** 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/ 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/mosaic-crochet-made-easy/ ref=ravelry 3 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-color-changes-made-easy/ ref=ravelry > please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites
